text:
Principal org.apache.catalina.Realm.authenticate(String username, String credentials) and the other authentication methods should be enhanced with the request.

Purpose: during an authentication, it should be possible in a webApp-level log to record important details such as 
- remote IP
- SSL cipher
- client cert used (if applicable)

At least interface Authenticator.authenticate() and

   boolean org.apache.catalina.authenticator.AuthenticatorBase.authenticate(Request request, HttpServletResponse response) throws IOException

have everything needed.
